label.mix_with_queue: Shuffle tracks with other tracks in the queue
label.ask_how_add_query_to_queue: {0}, how to add request `{1}` to queue?
label.ask_find_track_by_query: {0}, search for a track using the query `{1}`?
label.loading_take_some_time: It will take some time to load
label.mix_query_with_queue: Shuffle with other tracks in queue
cmd.set_dj_channel.desc: Sets a channel on the server to play music
cmd.remove_dj_channel.desc: Disables the channel for playing music
cmd.play.desc: Plays video or playlist(s) by quick launch title or title/link
cmd.play.url_or_name: Link or title (you can specify several separated by commas)
cmd.play.insert: Add a track out of order
cmd.clear_music_cache.desc: Deletes a specific or all tracks stored in the cache
cmd.clear_music_cache.url_or_name: Link or title (don't specify if you want to clear everything)
cmd.play_save.desc: Adds a quick launch title for the specified link
cmd.play_save.name: Quick launch name
cmd.stop.desc: Disconnect the bot from the voice channel and clear the track list
cmd.remove_track.desc: Removes the specified track from the list of saved titles
cmd.remove_track.name: Quick Launch Name
cmd.get_track_names.desc: Returns all titles for the specified track
cmd.get_track_names.url_or_name: Link or name of the saved track
cmd.tracklist.desc: Returns a table of saved tracks for dj-bot
